title: Introducing the Hurley SMC Board: A Portable Studio Floor Solution
summary: Photographer Peter Hurley introduces a new product designed to replace heavy and fragile plexiglass for studio flooring. He demonstrates a lightweight, rollable board that offers both matte and glossy finishes, solving common issues with transport and durability.

steps.action: Identify the problems with traditional plexiglass flooring, showing a broken and heavy sheet.
Introduce the new prototype product, a lightweight rollable tube that is easy to transport.
Unroll the board onto the studio floor.
Explain the dual-sided nature of the board (gloss on one side, matte on the other).
Remove the protective film to reveal the glossy surface.
Showcase the final reflective quality of the floor.

key_takeaways: Traditional plexiglass is prone to breaking, heavy, and difficult to transport.
The new board is rollable, lightweight, and can be taken on airplanes without extra charges.
The product is reversible, offering both matte and glossy shooting surfaces.
Peeling the protective film is significantly easier and faster than with standard plexiglass.
